question: I notice pain more than most other people (my age).
I am often aware of physical sensations or changes.
I often find it difficult to resist thoughts of illness.
I am often afraid of having a serious illness.
I regularly have images in my mind in which I see myself as ill.
I often find it difficult to distract myself from thoughts about my health.
At first I feel relieved, but after a while the worries always return.
When I hear about an illness, I often think that I might have that illness.
When I notice a physical sensation or change, I always ask myself what it means.
In general, I feel that I have a moderate risk of developing a serious illness.
I often think that I might have a serious illness.
When I feel an unclear physical sensation, I often find it difficult to think about anything else.
My family/friends would say that I worry too much about my health.
